mapper.select: select recorder.id, recorder.agent_name, recorder.agent_type, recorder.contact_user, recorder.contact_phone, recorder.add_user, recorder.add_time, recorder.check_status, recorder.check_user, recorder.check_time, recorder.login_name, recorder.check_remark, recorder.contract_number, recorder.bind_time, recorder.registered_type, recorder.agent_identity_id, recorder.agent_register_address, recorder.certify_image_urls,recorder.contact_email, agentAccount.agent_name as parentAgentName, recorder.parent_id from agent_account_checking_recorder recorder left join agent_account_info agentAccount on recorder.parent_id=agentAccount.id where recorder.id=#{agentId}

select recorder.id, recorder.agent_name, recorder.agent_type, recorder.contact_user, recorder.contact_phone, recorder.add_user, recorder.add_time, recorder.check_status, recorder.check_user, recorder.check_time, recorder.login_name, recorder.check_remark, recorder.contract_number, recorder.bind_time, recorder.registered_type, agentAccount.agent_name as parentAgentName from agent_account_checking_recorder recorder left join agent_account_info agentAccount on recorder.parent_id=agentAccount.id
and recorder.check_status=1
and recorder.check_status!=1
and recorder.agent_name like concat('%',#{agentName},'%')
and recorder.check_status=#{checkStatus}
order by recorder.check_time desc, recorder.id desc
limit #{pageBean.offset},#{pageBean.pageSize}
